Debrief.Wrappers

Class ShapeWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.PlainWrapper
      • Debrief.Wrappers.ShapeWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Plottable>, java.util.EventListener, ColoredWatchable, Watchable, WatchableList, Editable, Editable.DoNotHighlightMe, Exportable, Plottable, Renamable, DraggableItem, HasDraggableComponents, SupportsPropertyListeners
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicShapeWrapper, PolygonWrapper

    public class ShapeWrapper
extends PlainWrapper
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, WatchableList, Watchable, DraggableItem, HasDraggableComponents, Editable.DoNotHighlightMe, Renamable

      • getNearestTo

        public final Watchable[] getNearestTo(HiResDate DTG)
        Description copied from interface: WatchableList
        get the watchable in this list nearest to the specified DTG. If the watchable list has start/finish times, only return a fix if the DTG supplied is during the "live" period of the watchables. If not DTG is present, or an invalid DTG is requested ,return all valid points
        Specified by:
        getNearestTo in interface WatchableList
        Parameters:
        DTG - to search for
        Returns:
        the nearest Watchable
